Why Us
Technical Consultancy

Chartered Engineers and other experts are available to advise on technical and scientific issues

Impartiality

We are fully independent from any company or group

Worldwide Network

We are willing to travel and have the necessary global networks of correspondents. African operations are managed from our offices in Luanda and Matadi

The Fee Scale

For claim adjusting, our fees and expenses normally form part of the claims and are recoverable from Underwriters. For consultancy work or legal services, our fees are based on competitive hourly rates. Recovery claims are handled on a No Cure-No Pay basis, if applicable. All Fees and Expenses related to the appointment of Lawyers, Experts and Surveyors are discussed and agreed upon with our clients or their Underwriters prior to instructions being given.
